item.description:
Invitation to join an American Idol 11 office pool

A friend of yours has set up an office pool on the web's premier office pool site, www.funofficepools.com, and would like you to participate in the pool. This pool, like all pools on Fun Office Pools is completely FREE to play. All you need to do is create an account (again - completely FREE and spam FREE as well) by clicking on the 'join pool' link below. It only takes a minute to sign up and join the pool - we hope you accept this invitation. These office pools are a lot of fun!

You have been invited to join TuftsA&S's office pool. To do so, just click join pool.

If the link does not work, copy http://www.funofficepools.com/joinpool.php?Passed_Pool_Key=eaf21551484 into the address field on your browser.

Pool Name: Jumbo Idols 2012

  • Password: tufts
  • Type: American Idol Pool
    Once the top group (could be 12, 13, 24 or 36) is announced, the pool begins. Get the amount of points you assign to a contestant if that contestant gets voted out. For the final week, you put your points on who you think will be the next American Idol.
  • Description: Tufts Faculty, Staff & Friends American Idol Office Pool


Welcome Jumbos
The Tufts Faculty, Staff & Friends American Idol office pool is a great way to enjoy the program and to compete with your colleagues. In fact, please feel free to forward this invitation to any Tufts colleagues who might be interested in joining.

The overall winner of this year's pool will be treated to lunch at a restaurant of your choosing by yours truly, Rich Kelley, BFO of Arts & Sciences. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me at rich.kelley@tufts.edu.
Note: the date of this meet-up is an estimate, but I cannot locate a broadcast schedule so it is a bit difficult to predict when the pack will be reduced to the top contestants.

Good Luck!
Rich
item.name: American Idol Pool
